page.iText: Select Replay to reattempt the simulation or select X in the top right corner to quit.

range.text:
Financial statement analysis questions, if answered, were done so with major errors. More attention and understanding are needed in several areas, including financial statements and ratios.

Review the following Online Learning Resources to know more about Analysis of Financial Statements:

link.name: Planning Financial Statements and Projections Data
YouTube: The Basics of Cash Flow Analysis

range.text:
Financial statement analysis questions were answered satisfactorily, but with some errors. Your responses indicate general understanding of financial statements, but with some misconceptions/confusions.

Review the following Online Learning Resources to know more about Analysis of Financial Statements:

link.name: Planning Financial Statements and Projections Data
YouTube: The Basics of Cash Flow Analysis

range.text: You answered all financial statement analysis questions correctly. Your responses indicate an understanding of financial statements.

Basic accounting concepts questions, if answered, were done so with major errors. More attention and understanding are needed in several areas, including accounting methods.

Review the following Online Learning Resources to know more about Basic Accounting concepts:

link.name: Khan Academy: Accounting and Financial Statements

range.text:
Basic accounting concepts questions were answered satisfactorily, but with some errors. Your responses indicate general understanding of accounting concepts, but with some misconceptions/confusions.

Review the following Online Learning Resources to know more about Basic Accounting concepts:

link.name: Khan Academy: Accounting and Financial Statements

range.text: You answered all basic accounting questions correctly. Your responses indicate an understanding of basic accounting concepts.

Basic principles of finance questions, if answered, were done so with major errors. More attention and understanding are needed in several areas, including calculating acquisition prices and assessing controls and risks.

Review the following Online Learning Resources to know more about Basic Principles of Finance:

link.name: YouTube: Weighted Average Cost of Capital (WACC)

range.text:
Basic principles of finance questions were answered satisfactorily, but with some errors. Your responses indicate general understanding of the principles of finance, but with some misconceptions/confusions.

Review the following Online Learning Resources to know more about Basic Principles of Finance:

link.name: YouTube: Weighted Average Cost of Capital (WACC)

range.text: You answered all basic finance questions correctly. Your responses indicate an understanding of the basic principles of finance.
